name: Enable CloudWatch Logging for DataSync Tasks
description: Ensure that all AWS DataSync tasks have CloudWatch logging enabled by configuring the CloudWatchLogGroupArn property. This allows for comprehensive monitoring and troubleshooting of data transfer activities.

name: Use AWS KMS Customer Managed Key for DataSync Encryption
description: Configure DataSync tasks to use AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMKs) for encryption of data in transit and at rest. This provides enhanced control and auditing capabilities for data protection.

name: Restrict DataSync Task Access to Specific VPC Endpoints
description: Configure DataSync tasks to use specific VPC endpoints for data transfer, restricting network access and enhancing security. This ensures that data transfer occurs only through designated and controlled network paths.

name: Implement Least Privilege Access for DataSync Tasks
description: Ensure that IAM roles associated with DataSync tasks follow the principle of least privilege, granting only the necessary permissions required for the specific data transfer operations.

name: Enable Integrity Verification for DataSync Transfers
description: Configure DataSync tasks to perform integrity checks during data transfer by enabling the 'Verify Data' option. This ensures that the data transferred matches the source data, maintaining data integrity.

name: Use HTTPS for DataSync Connections
description: Ensure that all DataSync connections use HTTPS (TLS) for secure communication. This applies to connections with storage systems, file systems, and object storage locations.

name: Implement Task-Level Filters for DataSync
description: Configure appropriate task-level filters for DataSync tasks to ensure that only necessary and authorized data is transferred. This helps in maintaining data security and reduces the risk of unauthorized data exposure.

name: Enable AWS CloudTrail for DataSync API Activity Monitoring
description: Ensure that AWS CloudTrail is configured to capture all API activities related to DataSync operations. This provides a comprehensive audit trail for security analysis, resource change tracking, and compliance auditing.

name: Implement Regular Review of DataSync Task Configurations
description: Establish a process for regular review and audit of DataSync task configurations, including access permissions, encryption settings, and network configurations. This helps maintain the security posture and identifies any deviations from security best practices.

name: Use Secure Authentication Methods for DataSync Tasks
description: Ensure that DataSync tasks use secure authentication methods appropriate for the source and destination locations. For example, use IAM roles for AWS services, and secure protocols like SMB encryption or NFS Kerberos for on-premises file systems.
